Package com.quantum.axe

Class JavascriptInjector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quantum.axe.JavascriptInjector
  • public class JavascriptInjector
extends Object
    A helper class that assists in injecting third party JavaScript libaries into a page under test. Selenium's executeScript method executes arbitrary JavaScript, which is wrapped at runtime in an Immediately Invoked Functional Expression. This means that scripts implemented as an IIFE fail (and many or most third party scripts are implemented as an IIFE).

    The answer is to inject the script adding a script tag to a page. So long as the script is available from a web server visible to the device under test, that is.

    • Field Detail

      • injectorFormat

        public static final String injectorFormat
        A script template used to inject a script into a web page. It appends the script URL to the document by creating a script element. It then adds a listener to this element in order to get notified when the script has loaded. Once loaded, it sets a global variable used to signal success. Another script then polls this value to determine when the script has been loaded. This technique borrows from the JQuery bookmarklet and work from Paul Irish.

        Why poll? Because executeAsyncScript fails reliably on desktop browsers...

        See Also:
        checkSuccessScript, Constant Field Values

      • checkSuccessScript

        public static final String checkSuccessScript
        A script used to find whether a prior script injection succeeded.
        See Also:
        injectorFormat, Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • injectJavaScript

        public static void injectJavaScript​(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver,
                                    URL url)
        Inject some JavaScript identified by the given URL into the device. This is intended for use with third party JavScript library dependencies required by this Selenium test.
        Parameters:
        driver - The remote web driver.
        url - The URL to inject.
        Throws:
        com.quantum.axe.JavascriptInjector.ScriptInjectionException - (a RuntimeException) if this fails.
